page.title: 07BROMPTON - LOCAL GOVERNMENT
page.content: In terms of local government Brompton is covered by the North Yorkshire County Council,Hambleton District Council and Brompton Parish Council.Nationally,the local M.P. is Mr Leon Brittan(Cons.)& the Euro-M.P. is Mr P.Vannick(Cons.).Local authority services include education(Primary School),social services (old peoples' homes),transport (buses)and safety (street lighting).The Parish Council collects a rate of 2.3p in the pound, which maintains the recreation field, greens and cemetery.Donations have also been given for kerbing the green, starting a Youth Club,repairing the church clock & the upkeep of the Village Hall.A Parish Newsletter now keeps electors up to date with village affairs.This was one of the first in the country to be produced.
